Job Description:
Job Description:

Work closely with Senior Management to identify, define and track key business metrics
Use advanced data modeling and analysis techniques to discover insights that will guide strategic decisions and uncover potential opportunities for various teams in CX
Ability to work with colleagues and stakeholders to gain an in-depth understanding of critical business requirements
The ability to analyze data models to deliver logical conclusions
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to interact with senior-level management regarding the implementation of changes
Sound knowledge and expertise churning and evaluating business data
Competence in writing reports and making presentations
Must be a self-starter who requires minimal supervision, with excellent problem-solving skills
Ability to multitask and work on a diverse range of requirements
Support senior business executives and managers in helping analyze business performance, goal and help achieve targets
Help monitor and drive projects through data-based analysis/tracking and performance indicators
Candidates having any CRM based skills are highly preferred[ e.g. Salesforce]

About Runo:
Runo is a fast-growing start-up in B2B SAAS, Call Management CRM space.
It offers Call Management CRM for sales teams across the globe. We are expanding rapidly and looking for smart talented individuals to be a part of this growth journey.
Visit www.runo.in to know more about us.
Location : Hyderabad
Qualification: Preferably MBA
Experience: 1 year
Offer CTC: 2-2.4 lpa
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: ₹200,000.00 - ₹240,000.00 per year
Benefits:

Health insurance
Provident Fund

Schedule:

Day shift

Work Location: In person
Expected Start Date: 12/09/2024
